page.title: 06Thurnham Glasson Dock School
page.content: t Glasson Dock school there has been a ot of activity going on. We have had a new block built and the whole school has been re-decorated. There is a men's toilet,a ladies toilet and a disabled\ staff toilet in the new block. There are 26 children and 2 teachers here called Mr.Fish who is the Headteacher and Mrs.Woodhouse. We have school meals and some of the pupils have packed lunches.We have a resident cook called Mrs.Casson. We also have an active P.T.A.and an ancillary help - Mrs.Fish and a board of governors. We play rounders and football in the playground. We also have a grassyard with swings and a climbing frame.This is our new play equipment. The school celebrated its 150th anniversary in September 1983 when everyone got dressed up to look as they would have done 150 years ago.
